author: _drinkcoffee
content: Polynomial Commitments for Witness Compression (Scope Ethereum 1.x): <@!689635476826619924> is delivering a talk tomorrow (actually in about 19 1/2 hour's time) at the Ethereum Engineering Group meet-up: 12:30pm Wednesday July 8, Brisbane, Australia time zone, on Polynomial Commitments. To register for this free online event: https://www.meetup.com/ethereum-engineering/events/270898069/
